name: Home - Introduction
headline: Hi, I’m Alexis. Nice to meet you.
text:
I’m a front-end developer currently living in my hometown of San Francisco, CA. I’ve been playing with the web since 1996, and have worked professionally in the web industry for 8+ years. I’ve developed sites for a variety of companies and organizations—large and small—and now am focusing on building and architecting component libraries and front-end UI systems for web software.

Tim Berners-Lee proposed the idea of the World Wide Web on my 6th birthday, so I like to think it was meant to be.
